about_the_game:
In the distant Milky Way galaxy, there hides a mysterious planet named Mozi Planet. This planet has a vast and boundless ocean, and every drop of seawater is shining with a mysterious light, as if telling the ancient interstellar secrets. As an elite engineer of the Galaxy Exploration Team, you shoulder the heavy responsibility of building a base on the Mozi Planet, taking a solid step forward for the interstellar exploration of mankind.
The core gameplay of this game is building and managing the base. Players will personally design and build their own interstellar base, from site selection, planning to construction, and every step requires careful planning and meticulous execution. During the construction process of the base, players need to rationally utilize resources and solve various challenges and problems to ensure the stability and development of the base.
As the base continues to expand, players will unlock more technologies and research projects, develop more advanced facilities and equipment, and provide stronger support and guarantee for the base. At the same time, players also need to cooperate and compete with other players or NPCs to jointly explore the mysteries of Mozi Planet and contribute to the interstellar future of mankind.
In the game, players will experience the hardships and joys of establishing an interstellar base from scratch, feel the harmonious coexistence of technology and nature, as well as the courage and wisdom of human exploration of the unknown. Mozi Planet is waiting for the arrival of the brave. Let's start this interstellar adventure journey together!
